title: redirection attacks
extract: A URL Redirection Attack is a kind of vulnerability that redirects you to another page freely out of the original website when accessed, usually integrated with a phishing attack. This page could lead to a malicious page that resembles the original, and tries to trick the user into giving their credentials.Jun 23, 2008
extract_html: A URL Redirection Attack is a kind of vulnerability that redirects you to another page freely out of the original website when accessed, usually integrated with a phishing attack. This page could lead to a malicious page that resembles the original, and tries to trick the user into giving their credentials.Jun 23, 2008
